extDescription.message: Smartphone simulator on computer very realistic with several models to test mobile websites.

popupActivation.message: Enable the simulator on the pages of this website

popupDeactivation.message: Disable the simulator on this website

siteIcompatible.message: The simulator is not available on this page in particular

developer.message: I support the developer of this extension to improve his product thanks to Google Analytics. Data is anonymous.

screenshotHelp.message: To save the picture with a good resolution, you can just do a right clic on it, then "Copy Image", or "Save Image As"

autoStart.message: If this option is activated, when you will start the simulator on a website, every time you will open a new tab on this website the simulator will be on.

sharing_h1.message: This extension is useful to you?

sharing_h2.message: So share it with your colleagues or friends

sharing_txt.message: Simulator to test your site on smartphone and tablet

pro_modale_h2_1.message: Remove ads and actively contribute to the development of this

shareTooltip.message: Share with a colleague, a friend,...
